content.12: Have I conceived all this people? have I begotten them, that thou shouldest say unto me, Carry them in thy bosom, as a nursing father beareth the sucking child, unto the land which thou swarest unto their fathers?
content.13: Whence should I have flesh to give unto all this people? for they weep unto me, saying, Give us flesh, that we may eat.
